text: Cun ojoti ravsani mo ʙar onon tilovat sud, onho, ki ʙa didori Mo umed nadorand, guftand: «Qur'one ƣajri in Qur'on ʙijovar jo digargunas kun!» Bigu: «Maro narasad, ki onro az sui xud digargun kunam. Har ci ʙa man vahj mesavad, pajravi hamon hastam. Metarsam, ki agar ʙa Parvardigoram nofarmon savam, ʙa azoʙi on ruzi ʙuzurg giriftor ojam»
